news_header: More than 30 people have died in a bus crash in Bolivia, where the driver likely lost control, causing the bus to fall nearly 800 meters. Fourteen others were injured, including four children.
news_original_title: Bus crash in Bolivia kills at least 30 people
news_text: The accident occurred between Potosi and Oruro, and speeding is suspected as a cause. This is the most serious road accident in Bolivia this year, with local reports indicating several injuries are serious. Road accidents are frequent in Bolivia, with an average of 1,400 fatalities annually.
